SELECT COUNT (A.UNIT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT MCD.COMPANY_CD , MCD.COMPANY_NM , MCD.DIVISION_CD , MCD.DIVISION_NM , MUP.PRICE_CATEGORY , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MUP.COMPANY_CD,MUP.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0011', MUP.PRICE_CATEGORY, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS PRICE_CATEGORY_NM , MUP.PARTNER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MUP.COMPANY_CD, MUP.DIVISION_CD, MUP.PARTNER_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PARTNER_NM , MUP.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.PURCHASE_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD,MI.DIVISION_CD, MI.PURCHASE_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UNIT_NM , MI.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD,MI.DIVISION_CD, MI.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , MUP.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MUP.COMPANY_CD,MUP.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MUP.CURRENCY_CD, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MUP.PREV_UNIT_PRICE , MUP.UNIT_PRICE , TO_CHAR(MUP.START_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MUP.END_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE , MUP.PRICE_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MUP.COMPANY_CD,MUP.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0012', MUP.PRICE_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS PRICE_TYPE_NM , MUP.MAIN_PARTNER_YN , MUP.USE_YN , MUP.DESCRIPTION , MUP.UPDATE_BY , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MUP.COMPANY_CD, MUP.DIVISION_CD, MUP.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATEBYNM , TO_CHAR(MUP.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_UNIT_PRICE MUP , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MUP.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MUP.DIVISION_CD AND MUP.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MUP.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MUP.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MUP.PRICE_CATEGORY = 'P'
AND MUP.PARTNER_CD IN (${partnerCd})
AND (PARTNER_CD LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' OR PARTNER_NM LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%')
AND (MUP.CUSTOMER_ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{customerItemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' )
AND (MUP.ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{itemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' )
AND MUP.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
) A ORDER BY A.COMPANY_NM , A.DIVISION_NM, A.PARTNER_NM, A.ITEM_ID

AND MUP.PARTNER_CD IN (${partnerCd})

AND (MUP.CUSTOMER_ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{customerItemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' )
AND (MUP.ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{itemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' )
AND MUP.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
) A ORDER BY KEY_ID,A.COMPANY_NM , A.DIVISION_NM, A.ITEM_ID )
WHERE KEY_ID BETWEEN #{startPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{endPage, jdbcType=INTEGER}
